comment.text: This text describes the ability to view and comment on a document. It's used to indicate the available actions, likely displayed as a button or option related to document access rights. Translators should ensure the description accurately reflects the actions of viewing and adding comments.

usage.context:
{ fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.Review },
 () => t("Common:ReviewDescriptionDocument"),
 )
 .with(
 { fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.Comment },
 () => t("Common:CommentDescriptionDocument"),
 )
 .with(
 { fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.ReadOnly },
 () => t("Common:RoleViewerDescription"),
 )
